name: RushBalls
description:
Rush Balls is a new tapping and dunking game with easy control. All you need is to tap the screen and control the flappy character - your unique basketball. But you must shoot the ball into basketball hoop before the timeout and each score you made will refill the time for the next dunk. How many balls can you shoot to the hoop continuously? Challenge your friends and beat their high scores!

How to play?
- Dunk balls and shoot hoops as many as possible within the time limit.
- The more balls you dunk, the more extra time you will gain and also the higher score you will get.
- Once you make perfect slam dunk, flame will be on the ball and improve your speed.
- Win more coins and add new balls to your collection.

Game Features:
- Free and fun to play with easy control
- Fantastic ball skins for your choice
- Highly optimized graphics and sounds.

Download this addictive basketball sports game and play for fun. Start now!
